sentence: Ms. BYNUM. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the outstanding  efforts made by one of my own constituents, Mr. Bob Sanders. Mr.  Sanders' feat of cycling across the continental United States at the  age of 85 is a true accomplishment. I include in the Record the  following article, written by Peyton…

…cease-fire in Lebanon, and the  ongoing threats to Iran.

Now is not the time to deprive our ally of the tools it needs to  protect American interests.

I yield to Senator Sanders.

Mr. RISCH. Has all time expired except for the time I have left?

Mr. RISCH. Mr. President, first of all, I agree with one and only one  thing that my friend from Vermont said,…
